project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a specified city using a public weather API. The program will display temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Research and choose a suitable public weather API
Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from the chosen API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement terminal output for displaying the fetched weather information
Write tests for the weather fetching and parsing functionalities
Execute tests to ensure the weather fetching and parsing functionalities work correctly
